Text: This is the 9th wii game I've tried for my wii, the 2nd that didnt work. Now I dont know if I did something wrong during the burning, but Ive tried twice with both imgburn and nero at low speed. So I wouldnt recommend this torrent.
this is a NTSC, that might be the reason. Looks like wiikey doesnt support this game...
